content: DD 110-W Core drill Compact, light diamond coring machine for wet or dry handheld coring from 16-162 mm (5/8 - 6-3/8) in diameter ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Diamond coring- - - ### FEATURES:Features High motor performance and sturdy two-speed gearing for optimum drilling speed Compact, lightweight unit – for much easier handling Safety clutch, overload protection and safety switch for maximum peace of mind when operating Drills penetrations quickly and effortlessly in brick, block and concrete Hilti BI+ quick-release connection lets you change core bits in seconds - no tools required (keyless system) Applications Handheld wet coring in reinforced concrete Dry coring in aerated concrete, sandlime block, perforated brick, solid brick and clinker Drilling of sockets for the installation of electrical fittings Through holes for cables and cable trays Through holes for pipes etc. in plumbing, heating and air conditioning installation For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Diameter range: 5/8 - 6-3/8 in Base material: Concrete, Masonry Operation mode: Hand-held drilling system Technical Data | Diameter range | 5/8 - 6-3/8 in | Base material | Concrete, Masonry | Operation mode | Hand-held drilling system | Number of gears | 2 | No load RPM | gear 1: 740 rpm; gear 2: 1580 rpm | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 12.6 lb | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 19.7 x 4.7 x 6.7 in | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 92 dB (A) | 1 | Tri. vibr. value for drilling into concrete (wet) with diamond core A (ah,DD) | 4.6 m/s² | Tri. vibr. value for drilling into concrete (wet) (ah,DD) - Corebit A | HWC | Corner accessibility | 1.9 in | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3476075 - Dry coring tool pkg DD 110-W - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD 110-W 120V Diamond coring tool - 1x 27 (2) Flat wrench set - 1x Gardena water connector (female) - 1x BI+ (M27x2) Chuck - 1x DD 110 Tool case assy - 1x Dry dust removal head DD 110-W - 1x Core rig adaptor BI+ TO BT 5/8-11 - 3476076 - Wet coring tool pkg DD 110-W - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD 110-W 120V Diamond coring tool - 1x 27 (2) Flat wrench set - 1x Gardena water connector (female) - 1x BI+ (M27x2) Chuck - 1x DD 110 Tool case assy - 1x B 51/350 SPX-L Core bit handh. - 1x B 76/350 SPX-L Core bit handh. - 1x B 101/350 SPX-L Core bit handh. - 3x Adapter DD-BI/M24 - 2087491 - Diam coring tool DD 110-W - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD 110-W 120V Diamond coring tool - 1x 27 (2) Flat wrench set - 1x Gardena water connector (female) - 1x BI+ (M27x2) Chuck - 1x DD 110 Tool case assy
